mapper.select: select count(*) from orderr a join connection b on a.cname = b.cname where osuju = "출고 요청" order by a.ono asc;

select a.ono, oday, uuid, osuju, a.cname, min(pproduct) as pproduct, min(pcount) as pcount, min(tcount) as tcount, min(pcode) as pcode, min(scount) as scount from orderr a join cart b on a.ono = b.ono join product c on b.pproduct = c.pname where osuju ='출고 요청' and scount not in ('제품 부족') group by ono, oday, uuid, osuju, cname;
select cname, pproduct, pcode,ocount,b.pprice from orderr a join cart b join product c on a.ono = b.ono and b.pproduct = c.pname where a.ono = #{ono};
select pproduct, pcode,pstock,ocount,amount from orderr a join cart b join product c on a.ono = b.ono and b.pproduct = c.pname where a.ono = #{ono};
mapper.update: update orderr ord ,cart car , product pro set pro.pstock = (select afpstock from (select (pstock - #{ocount}) afpstock from product where pcode = #{uuid})as afpstock), ord.sdate= now(), ord.tcount = #{tcount}, car.scount =#{scount}, ord.osuju = '출고 요청', ord.sdel ='출고 중', ord.tscount = #{tscount}, ord.tamount = #{tamount}, car.scount =#{scount}, car.amount = (select afamount from(select (amount + #{amount}) afamount from cart where pproduct = #{pproduct} and ono = #{ono})as afamount) where ord.ono = #{ono} and pcode = #{uuid} and pproduct = #{pproduct};
mapper.select: select sdate from orderr where ono = #{ono};
mapper.update: update orderr set osuju = "견적서 발행", sdel="출고 중" where ono =#{ono};
mapper.select: select uuid, a.cname, cemail, ono from orderr a join connection b on a.cname = b.cname where osuju = "견적서 발행" and ono = #{ono};

select amount,a.ono, oday, pcode, sdate, uuid, a.cname,pproduct,ocount,scount,osuju,otext,x,y,sdel from orderr a join connection b join product c on a.cname = b.cname and a.pproduct = c.pname order by a.ono asc;

select distinct a.ono, oday, uuid, osuju, a.cname, (select pname from product limit 1)as pproduct, pcount,(select pcode from product limit 1) pcode , tcount, x, y, sdel from orderr a join cart b join product c join connection d on a.ono = b.ono and c.pname = b.pproduct and a.cname = d.cname where osuju = "출고 요청" and a.ono = #{ono} order by a.ono asc;

select a.ono, oday, a.cno, a.cname, cnumber,uuid, pproduct, d.pcode, ocount, d.pprice, osum, otext, pcount from orderr a join cart b join connection c join product d on a.ono = b.ono and a.cname = c.cname and d.pname = b.pproduct where b.ono =#{ono};
select uuid, a.cname, ono, cemail from orderr a join connection b on a.cname = b.cname where osuju = "견적서 발행" and ono = #{ono};

select distinct oday,osuju, rday, (select pcode from product limit 1)as pcode, tscount, tamount, (select pname from product limit 1)as pproduct, tcount, uuid, sdel,pcount, a.ono,x,y,a.cname from orderr a join product b join cart c join connection d on c.pproduct = b.pname and a.ono = c.ono and a.cname = d.cname where osuju="견적서 발행" order by a.ono asc ;
mapper.insert: insert into shipment(ono, sname, sday, product, pcode , ocount, price, osum, pcount) (select a.ono, a.cname, oday, pproduct, pcode, ocount, c.pprice, osum, pcount from orderr a join cart b join product c on a.ono = b.ono and b.pproduct = c.pname where b.ono = #{ono});
mapper.select: select count(*) from shipment where ono = #{ono};
select count(snumber) from shipment where ono = #{ono};
mapper.update: update shipment set snumber = #{ceo} where ono =#{ono}
update orderr set sdel = "배송 중" , rday = current_date where ono = #{ono};
